heading: HR00934
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO EVALUATE THE RECENT REPORT OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH (DOH) THAT DESPITE ADVANCED MEDICINE, TUBERCULOSIS (TB) REMAINS TO BE A MAJOR CAUSE OF DEATH AMONG FILIPINOS AND RECOMMEND INTERVENTIONAL MEASURES TO ADDRESS THE SAME
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2017-05-09
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00934
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO EVALUATE THE RECENT REPORT OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH (DOH) THAT DESPITE ADVANCED MEDICINE, TUBERCULOSIS (TB) REMAINS TO BE A MAJOR CAUSE OF DEATH AMONG FILIPINOS AND RECOMMEND INTERVENTIONAL MEASURES TO ADDRESS THE SAME
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2017-04-20
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2017-05-09
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-05-03;
